name: 萌えSNAP! くのいちつばめ
summary:
大人気！つばめと一緒に写真が撮れます！
--
A big hit! You can take pictures together with sweet TSUBAME!
Ultra-high resolution
A big hit! You can take pictures together with sweet TSUBAME!
She'll always be by your side.
Choose her pose and facial expression, with portrait and landscape modes available.
Self-timer also included.
Android 2.2 or later
Requires Adobe AIR.
